serviceArea: Citrus Heights, Sacramento, Roseville, Folsom, Elk Grove, and surrounding Sacramento County communities within 50 miles
shortDescription: Personalized accounting, bookkeeping, and tax services since 1988. Woman-owned business with 40+ years experience. Elite QuickBooks ProAdvisor, IRS Licensed, CTEC Approved.
longDescription: Founded in 1988 by the committed and passionate Cindy Conklin, Accurately Yours Accounting Solutions embarked on a mission to redefine client relationships in the accounting world. Disillusioned by the impersonal approach of larger firms, Cindy wanted more than numbers on a balance sheetâ€”she wanted genuine connections. Over the years, her belief that every client is unique and not just a transaction has shaped our ethos. From fledgling startups to established businesses, we take pride in educating our clients and equipping them with best practices in bookkeeping and accounting tailored to their needs. With over 40 years of accounting experience, Cindy has left indelible marks in private and public accounting sectors. She is a certified Elite QuickBooks ProAdvisor, ensuring clients get the best software deals. Licensed by the IRS and approved by CTEC to prepare taxes, Cindy ensures her knowledge is evergreen, always updated, and always ready to serve.
imagesNote: Text-based logo only - accounting business typically doesn't need project photos
